plot: Filmed in 1969, but unreleased for 40 years, a film about a Tunisian who travels to France to see his brother, who has been imprisoned.
title: Le chien

plot_en: Filmed in 1969, but unreleased for 40 years, a film about a Tunisian who travels to France to see his brother, who has been imprisoned.
